title: Did Louis Vuitton Sponsor ‘Human Zoos’ in the 1800s and Early 1900s?
subtitle: Though they weren't typically billed as such, 'human zoos' were unfortunately a thing during the heyday of Western colonialism.
author: David Emery
vclaim: In the late 1800s and early 1900s, Louis Vuitton sponsored "human zoos" in which black people were put on display like exotic circus animals.
